Package zork

Class Item

java.lang.Object
zork.Thing
zork.Item
public class Item extends Thing
Items are things that can be taken, dropped, added to inventory and used (except water, can only be drunk)

      description - The items description
      state - The items state (fixed/removable)

      where - The items position
